task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_title: Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break Interest Survey
task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_introduction_text: We're considering introducing a Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break program to support employee wellbeing. This short survey will help us understand your interest and preferences. Your input is valuable and will take less than 3 minutes to complete.

survey_questions.question_text: How interested are you in participating in a 15-20 minute guided mindfulness and stretching session twice a week?
Which days would work best for you to participate? (Select all that apply)
What time of day would you prefer for these sessions?
What type of guidance would you prefer for these sessions?
Would you be more likely to participate if the sessions were team-based?
What potential benefits do you think you might gain from these sessions? (Select all that apply)
Please share any additional comments or suggestions about the proposed program:

task_2_satisfaction_data_analysis.recommendation_for_next_year: Based on the feedback, we recommend implementing more prize categories and improving the mobile app interface for next year's Step Challenge, as these were the most common suggestions that could enhance participant satisfaction and engagement.
